requirement_text: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for public content
DR RTO<=4h, RPO<=1h for CMS platform
Zero-trust access with SSO (NSW Identity/OIDC) and RBAC
All content and backups stored in Australia
Migration plan with content audit, redirects, and QA
Monthly SLA reporting: uptime, latency, incidents
Records retention aligned to NSW policy
Accessibility testing with automated and manual checks
API-first CMS design with content APIs for downstream
Training and handover materials for CMS editors
Comply with page limits and formatting rules in response
Provide SOC 2 Type II or equivalent controls evidence
